reviews: This is the worst application I‚Äôve ever installed. It‚Äôs not tested and not production-ready. I could not even use the functionality of this application at 100%. It‚Äôs slow; I got long frame drops when switching between tabs (I have an iPhone XS). I wrote that to support that they have significant performance issues and thoroughly described when and how this happens, the technical support didn‚Äôt answer; well done. Secondly, I wanted to delete my account. They have a page on the help centre ‚ÄúHow can I close my account?‚Äù which says go to your activity and click ‚Äúclose account‚Äù, then there has been a modal dialogue which required to input my password. Then I was redirected to settings page, and I can still sign in into my account. Coinbase doesn‚Äôt care about personal data protection and that they‚Äôre obliged to delete them when the subject no longer agrees to the storage and processing his data.
title: The worst application
